name: Toro Cantina
description: A vibrant spot for authentic tacos and Mexican fare with a modern twist, often featuring live music on weekends.

name: Villa Di Valletta
description: A long-established restaurant offering Italian classics with a strong emphasis on fresh seafood dishes.

name: Celadon Thai Restaurant
description: Known for authentic Thai flavors, this spot offers a cozy atmosphere with spicy curries and noodle dishes.

name: Iron Gate Cafe
description: A beloved local cafe with a diverse menu including vegan options, housed in a historic building with a charming vibe.

name: The Hollow Bar + Kitchen
description: A trendy spot combining unique fusion dishes with a lively atmosphere, often hosting live music events.

name: Stuyvesant Plaza Farmers Market Eatery
description: A seasonal eatery with food stalls offering creative tacos and fusion street food, reflecting local flavors.

name: Villa Italia
description: A Schenectady staple known for Italian cuisine with excellent seafood options, located in the heart of downtown.

name: Sukhothai
description: A cozy Lark Street favorite offering traditional Thai dishes with bold flavors in a welcoming setting.

name: Berben and Wolff's
description: A popular vegan deli offering creative sandwiches and comfort food, a go-to for plant-based eaters in the Capital Region.

name: Stacks Espresso Bar
description: A hip coffee shop with expertly crafted espresso drinks and a small, delicious brunch menu, perfect for a morning stop.

name: El Loco Mexican Cafe
description: A funky, local Mexican spot on Lark Street, known for its flavorful tacos and casual, colorful atmosphere.

name: Cafe Madison
description: A long-standing breakfast and brunch spot with great coffee, loved for its hearty meals and cozy diner feel.
